prompt:
Nurse: Perfect. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Does that sound good to you, Ms. Raynier?

Patient: Mhmm. Yeah.

Nurse: Excellent. Is there anything else about the logistics that's worrying you, Ms. Raynier?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Alright, Ms. Raynier. I'm glad to hear that the logistics seem clear. Before we move on to discuss your medications, I want to take a pause to see if you're ready to proceed. Can we move on?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Great, let's talk about your medications. I see on your chart that you are currently taking Plavix 75 mg once a day. As per the instructions, you were supposed to stop this medication 7 days prior to the procedure. Have you stopped taking Plavix, Ms. Raynier?

Patient: Well, yes. I thought it was

responses.gpt4: Good to hear that you've stopped the Plavix, Ms. Raynier. Is there anything about this medication that you want to understand more about?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry, Ms. Raynier, you were saying?
